0010010101111101 1001100000100000 0 -> sum: 1011110110011101, cout: 0
1010010001011011 1100010111111001 0 -> sum: 0110101001010100, cout: 1
0100000001101111 0100101110000101 1 -> sum: 1000101111110101, cout: 0
1010000001011000 0010011001100100 1 -> sum: 1100011010111101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
